rag.description: An agent to search CCC corpus of documents on California community colleges

rag_ipeds.description: An agent to search IPEDS meta data on California community colleges

search.description: An agent to search the internet using Google for content on California community colleges

synthesis.description: An agent to synthesize content into a research report format to provide to the user

synthesis_ipeds.description: An agent to synthesize IPEDS metadata search results
